item.title: Logan Lerman Spent 100 Hours in Bed for His New Film — and Loved Every Minute
item.description: The 33-year-old star of ‘Oh, Hi!’ plays a soft boy stuck in a situationship — but in real life, he’s focused on figuring out how to balance his decades-long career and hopeful parenthood.
